name: Bunnies Journey
description:
Seconds to learn, hours to master!

How to play: Use WSAD, Arrow Keys or the mouse to control your hero. Your hero can only move to adjacent tiles. Attack enemies to gain score while progressing through harder levels! The game is lost if your hero's health is reduced to 0.

There are different types of potions:

  • Green: Inflicts 1 damage per move until cured.
  • Yellow: Gives you a shield. Protects vs the next source of damage (including poison)
  • Red: Heals you to full.
  • Pink: Cures you of any poison.

Note:
Endless mode is the best way to get a highscore.
